predicate.note: Frames file for 'utilize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: In addition , the two companies will develop new steam turbine technology , such as the plants ordered [*] by Florida Power , and even utilize each other 's plants at times [*-1] to take advantage of currency fluctuations .
example.arg: [*-1] to take advantage of currency fluctuations
